snippet: Mr. Breck played a temperamental son in a ranching family headed by Barbara Stanwyck.
abstract: Peter Breck, who starred as Barbara Stanwyck’s most temperamental son Nick Barkley in the popular 1960s western series The Big Valley, dies at age 82.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Breck played a temperamental son in a ranching family headed by Barbara Stanwyck.

headline.seo: Peter Breck, 82, Actor in ‘The Big Valley,’ Is Dead
headline.main: Peter Breck, TV Actor Known for ‘The Big Valley,’ Dies at 82
headline.print_headline: Peter Breck, 82, TV Actor Known for ‘The Big Valley’
